name: Rampage Agents
abstract:
Rampage Agetns FREE TO PLAY.
Thank you to all the Agents for your support and affection. The Rampage Agents plan will become free-to-play on December 5, 2023, Pacific Time.

detail.app_release_note:
Significantly Improved Game Framerate
Comprehensive Enhancement of Gunplay
New Maneuverability
Optimized Shrink Circle Mechanism
Optimizations & Bug Fixes
· Fixed the bug where the Grapple could catapult players into the sky.
· Fixed the bug that allowed for the farming of Legendary Attachments from the Death Box.
· Fixed the bug with some of Barry's skins not becoming invisible in the Battle Royale mode.
· Fixed the weekly task: [BR] Deal 500 damage before the end of the first Circle Closing could not be completed.
· Fixed the bug that caused noise when AI attempted to rescue teammates.
· Fixed some bugs where Attachments and Chips were not effective.
· Optimized AI difficulty, reducing early-game AI difficulty and increasing it later in the game.
· Optimized the reward collection for the pass, now it will jump directly to the location where rewards can be collected.
· Optimized the loading speed of various interfaces and scenes.
· Other series of optimizations.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link
